channel.title: Best server
channel.description:
Hi im new here...
well im not so good in english but i want 2 ask...what is the best private server??everiwhere i was there was 0 players
i hope u can give me a good server with much players :o[br][size=1]Posted at: July 11, 2006, 09:46:03 AM[/size][hr]oh....is this RS classic?!......i mean RS2....srry i posted wrong place
